doc.title: Masquerade
doc.plot: 'Summertime' meets 'Don't Look Now'. If you go chasing rabbits... Menace in Venice - A woman looks for something unspecified in Venice. The vibe of ages emerges from the aging fabric of a beautiful city. Travel broadens the mind so they say! An unplanned journey into the unknown, a mirror world, a 'daymare'. All is not as it once seemed, all is never as it seems. What lurks Pip old chap?
